job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>Client located headquartered in Denver, Colorado is seeking a 100% remote Data Scientist for a long term contract position.&nbsp;This position will participate on a small team that&nbsp;will work with medical, claims, and policy related data that comes in a variety of formats – structured and unstructured - to generate insights and embed artificial intelligence into applications.</p><p><br></p><p>Required:</p><p>-Python.</p><p>-Strong modeling skills.</p><p>-Knowledge of BASH.</p><p>-SQL coding.</p><p><br></p><p>Desired:</p><p>-Data library experience (spaCy, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, XGBoost, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Keras, etc.).</p><p>-Experience working with insurance data (medical records, insurance claims, policy data).</p><p>-API development.</p><p>-Google Cloud Platform.</p>
